rows.label: tlk400401_msg0001
rows.name:
Umon very lucky to have Tora and
friends helping with boat building!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0002
rows.name:
Most important part to collect is
Puzzletree Wood. This is necessary
for making sturdy rudder.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0003
rows.name:
Puzzletree Wood is common to find in
Gula, so should not be too tricky.
Try looking in area around Torigo.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0004
rows.name:
And one more thing.
I also need supply of Diamond Oak.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0005
rows.name:
This is quite rare material, but crucial
for making strong bow of ship. Friends
may have a difficult time finding it.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0006
rows.name:
In Gula, only place it can be found
is location called Dawnview Grotto.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0007
rows.name: Also...

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0008
rows.name:
Wait, no. Should not make too many
requests at once, or friends will get
confused. First just bring me those two!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0009
rows.name:
Meh-meh?! Friends really brought
all materials requested?

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0010
rows.name:
This indeed is Puzzletree Wood and
Diamond Oak... Very impressive!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0011
rows.name:
This should be enough to make
strong boat frame.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0012
rows.name:
But too soon for celebrations!
Please don't get angry...

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0013
rows.name:
Maybe we have all bits we need...
but Divine Beast escaped.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0014
rows.name:
Umon unfortunately forget to feed
poor Divine Beast. So Divine Beast swan off with
rumbly tummy.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0015
rows.name: So friends must go and find Divine Beast.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0016
rows.name:
Naughty Divine Beast was heading for
Masrah Spring in Gula.
Surely you find it there.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0017
rows.name:
Once you find Divine Beast, feed it the
Green Pollen Orbs I provide you.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0018
rows.name:
That forms contract between you and
Divine Beast. As long as you give Pollen Orbs,
it gladly serve as your boat.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0019
rows.name:
Of course, if you run out of Green
Pollen Orbs like before, that as far
as you go...

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0020
rows.name:
But this is traditional Nopon taming
method. Not like rough taming methods
used by Superbia.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0021
rows.name:
Eheh! Friends now privy to very
secret trick of Divine Beast trade!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0022
rows.name: A-anyway, go down to Masrah Spring.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0023
rows.name:
Naturally, Divine Beasts not show up except
when Cloud Sea is high, so be aware.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0024
rows.name:
Go to Masrah Spring and tame
a Divine Beast for use in ship.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0025
rows.name:
But be aware that Divine Beasts not show up
when Cloud Sea level is low.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0026
rows.name:
Friends want to know how to make
Cloud Sea level rise?

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0027
rows.name:
Well, if friends stay at inn, level
will usually have changed by time
of waking up.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0028
rows.name:
Wonderful!
Friends come back!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0029
rows.name:
Have fed many Green Pollen Orbs now,
and attachment to ship frame is all
complete. Can set sail any time!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0030
rows.name: No need for thanks.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0031
rows.name:
Once friends are ready to set sail, come
talk to Umon.

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0032
rows.name:
Latest and greatest Umon vessel
is ready and raring to go!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0033
rows.name: Feel free to depart any time!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0034
rows.name: Set sail for the World Tree?

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0035
rows.name: Set sail

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0036
rows.name: Not yet

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0037
rows.name:
Have a good trip, friends!
Take care, Tora!

rows.label: tlk400401_msg0038
rows.name:
No need to rush. Take all time you
need with preparations. This ship
will always be waiting for friends.
